title: Gardenia "I Am Renewed" Affirmation Candle - 17.5 OZ
description:
Embrace a fresh start with the "I Am Renewed" Gardenia Affirmation Candle, designed to uplift and rejuvenate your spirit. Featuring top notes of gardenia and lemon peel, middle notes of tuberose, green floral, and jasmine, and a soft powdery base, this candle fills your space with a serene, floral elegance.

Hand-poured in a reusable clear jar, this candle is crafted with coconut wax for a clean, long-lasting burn that is pet-friendly and vegan. With two flat braided cotton wicks (lead and zinc-free), it offers a smooth, even burn for up to 60+ hours.
